sources.title: Everlasting | Full Movie | Crime Drama | Georgina Cates | Valentina de Angelis
sources.description:
Everlasting - A High School Filmmaker documents his solo journey from Colorado to L. A. in search of the serial killer responsible for the murder of his girlfriend.
2016.  Stars: Adam Perez, Pat Healy, Elisabeth Röhm, Bai Ling

metadata.Plot: A High School Filmmaker documents his solo journey from Colorado to L. A. in search of the serial killer responsible for the murder of his girlfriend. The film intermixes home footage, real time clips and the eventual climax with the murderer.
metadata.Actors: Valentina de Angelis, Adam Perez, Bernardo Peña
